title: League isn't wanting to download for some reason?
body:
So, the launcher comes up fine and everything, but the game itself isn't wanting to download.
The launcher pops up, ready for me to sign in, but when i check the top left side that says its downloading, it almost always sky-rockets into 1k+ minutes, and refuses to come down. It also will get about 60% through or so, and then will just randomly start over. It's starting to get really frustrating, and i dont know what to do at this point. I've tried using the Hextech repair tool, just to try, and still the same problem persists.
Please Help,
Thanks.

replies.body: Is this the first time you're installing League or is this a patch you're trying to download? Take a couple basic steps really quick by updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and double checking your network settings like Port Forwarding and DNS settings using the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Hit me back up if that hasn't helped at all though!

Same problem here! Riot does not want to fix this. Because they don't want new players to download their game! I'm frustrating with this same problem more than a week still I can't figure it out a proper solution. 

The only solution has quit this game and started playing other MOBA games.
